External Mode enables real-time parameter tuning and signal monitoring on running hardware through a communication link between Simulink and the target device.

Overview

Key capabilities:

  • Modify parameters in real-time without rebuilding
  • Monitor signals and scopes while application runs
  • Capture data from hardware to Simulink workspace
  • Compare simulation vs. hardware behavior

Setup Steps

  • Configure communication interface (UART, USB, etc.)
  • Enable External Mode in model configuration
  • Build and download model to hardware
  • Connect to target and start monitoring

PIL testing verifies generated code by executing it on actual hardware and comparing results with simulation.

Benefits

  • Verify code generation correctness
  • Measure execution time and performance
  • Detect numerical differences between simulation and hardware
  • Profile code for optimization

PIL Workflow

  • Create PIL block from subsystem
  • Configure communication interface
  • Run simulation with PIL block
  • Compare results with normal simulation
  • Analyze performance metrics
